name: PhysicallyBasedMaterial
desc: A material that simulates the appearance of real-world objects.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a physically based material.

items.name: var baseColor: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.BaseColor
items.desc: The color of an entity unmodified by lighting.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.BaseColor
items.desc: An object that defines an entity’s base color.

items.name: var roughness: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Roughness
items.desc: The amount the surface of the 3D object scatters reflected light.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Roughness
items.desc: An object that defines the roughness of an entity’s surface.

items.name: var metallic: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Metallic
items.desc: The reflectiveness of an entity.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Metallic
items.desc: An object that defines the reflectiveness of an entity.

items.name: var normal: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Normal
items.desc: The normal map for the entity.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Normal
items.desc: An object that specifies an entity’s normal map.

items.name: var blending: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Blending
items.desc: The transparency of an entity.

items.name: enum PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Blending
items.desc: The object that defines the transparency of an entity.

items.name: var ambientOcclusion: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.AmbientOcclusion
items.desc: The ambient occlusion values for a material.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.AmbientOcclusion
items.desc: An object that defines the ambient occlusion of an entity’s surface.

items.name: var specular: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Specular
items.desc: The specular highlight applied to the entity.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Specular
items.desc: An object that defines the specular highlights of an entity.

items.name: var sheen: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.SheenColor?
items.desc: The intensity of an entity’s sheen.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.SheenColor
items.desc: An object that defines the color of an entity’s sheen.

items.name: var clearcoat: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Clearcoat
items.desc: The transparent highlights that simulate a clear, shiny coating on an entity.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Clearcoat
items.desc: An object that defines the intensity of an entity’s clear, shiny coating.

items.name: var clearcoatRoughness: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.ClearcoatRoughness
items.desc: The degree to which an entity’s clear, shiny coating scatters light to create soft highlights.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.ClearcoatRoughness
items.desc: An object that defines the degree to which an entity’s clear, shiny coating scatters light to create soft highlights.

items.name: var anisotropyLevel: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.AnisotropyLevel
items.desc: The degree to which an entity reflects light to create stretched or oblong highlights.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.AnisotropyLevel
items.desc: An object that defines the degree to which an entity reflects light to create stretched or oblong highlights.

items.name: var anisotropyAngle: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.AnisotropyAngle
items.desc: The anistropy angle.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.AnisotropyAngle
items.desc: An object used to define a material’s anisotropy angle.

items.name: var emissiveIntensity: Float
items.desc: The intensity of light emitted by the entity.

items.name: var emissiveColor: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.EmissiveColor
items.desc: The color of the light the entity emits.

items.name: struct PhysicallyBasedMaterial.EmissiveColor
items.desc: An object that defines the color of the light an entity emits.

items.name: var textureCoordinateTransform: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.TextureCoordinateTransform
items.desc: A two-dimensional transformation to apply to the entity’s primary texture coordinates.

items.name: var secondaryTextureCoordinateTransform: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.TextureCoordinateTransform
items.desc: A two-dimensional transformation to apply to the entity’s secondary texture coordinates.

items.name: struct MaterialParameterTypes.TextureCoordinateTransform
items.desc: An object that defines a transformation the framework applies to a material’s UV-mapped textures.

items.name: typealias PhysicallyBasedMaterial.TextureCoordinateTransform
items.desc: An alias for the texture coordinate transform that’s appropriate for this material class.

items.name: var faceCulling: PhysicallyBasedMaterial.FaceCulling
items.desc: A process in which the system specifies polygons to remove before rendering a scene.

items.name: enum MaterialParameterTypes.FaceCulling
items.desc: An object that defines how the system removes polygons before rendering a scene.

items.name: typealias PhysicallyBasedMaterial.FaceCulling
items.desc: An alias for the face culling object that’s appropriate for this material class.

items.name: typealias PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Parameters
items.desc: The parameter type to use for materials of this class.

items.name: typealias PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Texture
items.desc: The texture type to use for materials of this class.
